title: Can't go in game ?!
body: PLS HELP ME! When I start a game it doesn't go in loading screen and when i try to reconnect nothing happends. I tried to restart my league and pc but it still doesn't work. So please can somebody help me ?

replies.body: This happened to me also. I opened a support ticket but no response so far. Best thing i can tell you is try a full repair, that's going to be the next thing they tell you to try
it happens to me, i was banned(punished) becuase of this
